title: Research Paper Schema
description: A schema to validate a list of research papers, including metadata about the paper and its authors.

paper_title.description: The title of the research paper.

paper_id.description: A unique identifier for the paper.

pdf_url.description: The URL to the PDF of the paper.

author_list.description: A list of the paper's authors.

affiliation_name.description: The name of the author's affiliation(s).

affiliation_domain.description: The domain of the author's affiliation.

affiliation_country.description: The country of the author's affiliation (2-letter code).

top_author_from_india.description: Indicates if the top-billed author is from India.

majority_authors_from_india.description: Indicates if the majority of authors are from India.

paper_content.description: A brief summary or abstract of the paper's content.

venue.description: The presentation format of the paper at the venue (e.g., poster, spotlight, oral).
